message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper deals with text segmentation, which is a task related to natural language processing (NLP). The paper also mentions applications in information retrieval and text summarization, which are subfields of NLP. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also mentions the use of machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with multilabel text classification, which is a task related to information retrieval, suggesting that it could belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper mentions the use of distant supervision, which is a technique related to data mining and knowledge discovery, suggesting that it could belong to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
